ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 55-210mm Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm f/8 Mirror Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <5> Spare NP-FW50 Battery + <6> Sunpak 40.5mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Vivitar 49mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case + <9> PD-C20 Camera/Camcorder Case +
<10> T Mount for Sony NEX + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <13> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-6 Digital Camera Body & 16-50mm Lens (Black) with E 55-210mm Lens & 500mm Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Monopod + Accessory Kit
